text: Dharati ute apane apa nu vada samajhana ate suri'am hujatam karana. Ate buri'am hujatam di musibata tam buri'am hujatam karana vali'am upara hi a'undi hai. Tam ki iha usa vidhana di udika vica hana jihara pichale hom cuke lokam de sabadha vica pragata ho'i'a hai. So tusim alaha de vidhana vica na ko'i tabadili dekhauge ate na hi alaha de vidhana nu talada ho'i'a vekhauge
